actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount excluded from gain on the sale of a principal residence for both single and joint filers to $1,000,000.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $1 million the exclusion from gain on the sale of a personal residence and makes such exclusion available to both single and joint filers.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount excluded from gain on the sale of a principal residence for both single and joint filers to $1,000,000.
